imdb.plot outline: Ever dream of quitting your day job and taking the trip of a lifetime? Ever wish you could ditch the guidebook and go straight to where the locals go? For each episode of This Is My City, Tim and Thomas find a local who is willing to show them what life is really like in Lisbon, Beirut, Beijing and five other global metropolises - Over the course of a madcap weekend, they film everything that transpires, no matter how dangerous, bizarre or borderline illegal. This Is My City is a show about what cities mean to the people who live in them, brought to you in the most personal way. It's not about seeing the sights; it's about seeing the soul.
imdb.title: This Is My City
plot: Ever dream of quitting your day job and taking the trip of a lifetime? Ever wish you could ditch the guidebook and go straight to where the locals go? For each episode of _This Is My City_ (qv), Tim and Thomas find a local who is willing to show them what life is really like in Lisbon, Beirut, Beijing and five other global metropolises - Over the course of a madcap weekend, they film everything that transpires, no matter how dangerous, bizarre or borderline illegal. _This Is My City_ (qv) is a show about what cities mean to the people who live in them, brought to you in the most personal way. It's not about seeing the sights; it's about seeing the soul.
